title: Riot about Evelynn and hextech protbelt
body:
Is there any reason why the fire from that item or any other item ({{item:3146}} {{item:3030}} ) dont prock Eve W? can we pls make them so they prock it?

Evelynn is the only "Assasin" that warning someone from a huge distance that she is about to come to him and she dosent have any jump or MS steroid after you remove it

At least make it so this items can prock his W

Ok thanks

replies.body:
The primary reason is that the items would make her W proc pattern too reliable.

But there's also the factor that this would force designers in the future to take into account the fact that Evelynn's W can get proc'd by items. It'd make designing items in the future potentially a lot more problematic. It's easier to just have the ability get proc'd only by Evelynn's spells instead.

As an aside, Evelynn's performing pretty well right now. If you're having difficulties accessing her charm, you may need to try different play patterns (such as flanking, extinguishing the charm early for the slow, or charming a fake target to bait a squishy target into a false sense of security).
And what about her E bug? The ability is interrupted if enemy gets out of sight during the cast animation and it goes on cooldown. Kinda screws her ganks whenever it happens.

Should be resolved next patch~ Stashu recently solved the issue.

And to exactly answer your question it simply for the sake of counterplay and balance. By giving power to the kit through an item it can be heavily unbalanced. The item could even be nerf because of that. (Because Riot usually prefers to avoid nerfing a champion because of an item except for extreme abuse). The balance between kit power and build power would be thinner and harder to deal with. 

Hextech revolver got what? 700 range? Almost as large as Eve's stealth Radius. You don't want Eve to be balanced around it (it would means that she's more or less obliged to build it to be efficient). And she would be balanced around it since it would be a point & click cc every 40s. The same could apply more or less to other Hextech item since they're both AoE they can land easily (not as much as a point & click) due to large radius hit and fast travel time.

{{champion:107}} also warns people. And Evelynn is the only assassin with perma stealth and therefore ward immunity.

Can people stop trying to break Evelynn into permaban status? She is fine. She's like the only assassin whose winrate actually increases the longer the game goes because her lategame assassination has no counterplay. You don't need W to kill squishies after a couple items.
